GSD.description:
rcu-tasks: Ensure RCU Tasks Trace loops have quiescent states

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 0994d9c62b5e960341e6abf6fc4e4a86b03e095a. For more details please see the references link.
